roomfull.content: You cannot join this lobby. The lobby is full.

notowner.content: You cannot change lobby settings. You are not the lobby owner.

notownerstart.content: You cannot start the game. You are not the lobby owner.

alreadyjoinedspectator.content: You are already spectator in this lobby.

nospectator.content: You cannot join this lobby as spectator. This lobby does not allow spectators to join.

roomclosedspectator.content: The room was closed because no non-spectator were left.

notartist.content: You cannot draw on the canvas. You are currently not the artist.

login.content: Welcome back! Your drawings will be saved to your art gallery. Enjoy your stay!

wronglogin.content: This username is already claimed. Try a different username or check your password.

wronglogin2.content: The provied password is wrong. Please check your login details.

registerd.content: Welcome to your newly claimed account! Your drawings will be saved to your art gallery. Enjoy your stay!

notregistered.content: This username is not claimed! You can claim this username by providing a password. Only registered users can view their art gallery. Enjoy your stay!

nouser.content: The provided username is not registered. Please check your login details.

unknownerror.content: An unexpected error has accured. Please refresh the page!
